job_tasks.phrase: help build the infrastructure behind the many hundreds of thousands of websites hosted within Total Webhosting Solutions.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates the primary responsibility of building and maintaining the underlying infrastructure for web hosting services, which falls under software development.

job_tasks.phrase: deploy and run our tens of thousands of virtual machines.
job_tasks.justification: Deploying and managing virtual machines is a core task within infrastructure software development.

job_tasks.phrase: improve CloudStack by fixing bugs, adding features
job_tasks.justification: Fixing bugs and adding features to an existing software project (CloudStack) is a direct software development activity.

job_tasks.phrase: supporting the operational engineering team with your knowledge of the code when using CloudStack.
job_tasks.justification: Supporting an operational engineering team implies contributing to the smooth running and maintenance of the system in production, which relates to operations.

job_tasks.phrase: You find it a challenge to find out where mistakes are and don't mind having to dive deep until a problem is solved.
job_tasks.justification: This implies debugging and problem-solving, which is a fundamental part of model development and maintenance, although the focus here is on software rather than ML models specifically.

soft_skills.phrase: You find it a challenge to find out where mistakes are and don't mind having to dive deep until a problem is solved.
or you are willing to invest in this knowledge.
enthusiastic and flexible software developer who enjoys building Open Source software that is used within a company.

classification.rationale: This role focuses on infrastructure development for cloud orchestration (Apache CloudStack) using traditional software engineering tools and languages. There is no mention of AI, machine learning, generative models, or related concepts, which are central to the GenAI Engineer and ML Engineer profiles.
